page.title: 09THE DERNGATE CENTRE
page.content: On 5th July 1985 a group of us went to see the Derngate Centre.We learnt quite a lot about its building and its use.We discovered that the building cost Â£9M. to erect,was begun in 1980 and finished in 1983.The theatre part can seat a maximum number of 1483 people.There is one stage which is mobile as is the seating.Everything can be arranged in a different way according to what sort of event is being staged.Many varied shows are put on including boxing,wrestling, snooker,pop groups,plays,musicals,and symphony concerts.There are 14 dressing rooms to accommodate up to 70 artists. It is attached to the historic Royal Theatre(built 1884).There are several bars and restaurants and facilities for conferences and dinner dances.There has been a lot of argument about its cost and the burden on the local taxpayer but it does bring top artists to town.
